style.base: px-5 py-2.5 rounded-lg bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-purple-600 text-white font-semibold transition-transform hover:scale-105
style.mobile: mt-4 w-full px-5 py-2.5 rounded-lg bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-purple-600 text-white font-semibold

styles.navbar: fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 bg-gradient-to-b from-blue-50/95 via-blue-50/60 to-transparent backdrop-blur-md shadow-none
styles.logoGradient: text-3xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-400 to-purple-600 bg-clip-text text-transparent

navLink.base: text-gray-800 hover:text-purple-600 font-semibold text-lg transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 relative after:absolute after:w-0 after:h-0.5 after:bg-cyan-500 after:left-1/2 after:-translate-x-1/2 after:-bottom-1 after:transition-all after:duration-300 hover:after:w-full
navLink.mobile: block px-4 py-3 rounded-lg text-base font-semibold text-gray-800 hover:text-purple-600 hover:bg-blue-100/70 transition-all duration-300

styles.mobileMenu: px-2 pt-2 pb-3 space-y-1 sm:px-3 bg-gradient-to-b from-blue-50/95 to-blue-50/80 backdrop-blur-md
styles.mobileButton: inline-flex items-center justify-center p-2 rounded-md text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-900 hover:bg-blue-100/50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset focus:ring-blue-200
